Entries.Introduction: You must be @. #$b# I'm Lin. #$b# Nice to meet you.
Entries.GreenRain: Am I the only one panicking?! #$e# How are you still calm in THIS weather?!
Entries.GreenRain_2: At least we know it's safe... #$e# Last time this happened, I was thinking it was acid rain.
Entries.GreenRainFinished: Turns out it doesn't do much harm. #$b# That's a relief.
Entries.spring_1: My great-grandfather always said that the first day of the year is the greatest day of the year. #$b# I feel lucky I met him before he passed away.
Entries.summer_1: Everybody here seems to love hot peppers. #$e# Plant 'em before it's too late. #$b# You won't regret it, trust me.
Entries.fall_1: I heard pumpkins can make quite a bit of money. #$b# Although, they do take a while to grow...
Entries.fall_13: Is my birthday today, or tommorow, @? #$b# I always get confused with all these festivals.
Entries.winter_1: The only thing you can grow in Winter is a Powdermelon. #$b# But the seeds can't be bought, only found.
Entries.spring_12: $q Q1_response_ID1/Q1_response_ID2 Q1_fallback#Ready for the Egg Festival?#$r Q1_response_ID1 0 Q1_reaction1#Not yet.#$r Q1_response_ID2 0 Q1_reaction2#Yup!
Entries.Q1_reaction1: Don't worry, you still have some time to prepare.
Entries.Q1_reaction2: $q Q2_response_ID1/Q2_response_ID2 Q2_fallback#Great! I'll see you there.
Entries.spring_23: I don't think I'll be dancing at the Flower Dance. #$b# I don't have a partner.
Entries.summer_10: I heard the Governor will test the soup tommorow at the Luau. #$b# I'll probably put in some of my gold-quality hot peppers.
Entries.summer_27: I hope the Midnight Jellies do come tommorow night.
Entries.fall_15: I wonder who will have a booth tommorow...
Entries.fall_26: I wonder why they call it the Spirit's Eve. #$b# I guess I'll find out tommorow.
Entries.winter_7: I betcha Willy will win tommmorow at the Ice Festival.
